name: Lionheart Roar
text: By far the most courteous and consistent pizza chain in Laredo. They also make great food. Keep up the great work. Your people and your menu is deserving of much more praise.

name: Josie P.
text: I love hungry howie's. It is my favorite pizza place!!! But.....not this one. I had a party and order pizzas, everything was fine until I sent the pizzas on the counter.....after an hour, we started seeing tiny ants in the jalepeno …More

name: GRV
text: This place is actually pretty good for a quick bite. There is only 2 tables for dining in. I reccomend this place for take out. The taste of the Pizza is better than the little Cesar's. So if you ran out of time and are in desperate need for something quick and good to satisfy your love ones this is the spot. Enjoy!!

name: alicia blake
text: Nice spot for Pizza. Entered near eleven, it wasn't packed. The bill was average for the menu. I can see why they have so many reviews.

name: Daisy R
text: A wrong order that came out delicious. Ordered online for a pepperoni pizza but once I got home it was a cheese pizza. Decided to try it and it was great. Not that greasy and wonderful seasonings that makes it the best cheese pizza I've had in a long time. The bread is not soggy nor is the cheese burnt.

name: yusnier gutierrez
text: I would never go to this place again. Manager has very poor customer services skills. He was hostile and his workers don’t even know the menu. THANK YOU MANAGER. I WILL NEVER ORDER FOOD FROM YOU GUYS AGAIN GOOD LUCK WITH YOUR RESTAURANT!!!!!!

name: Angel Oconner
text: Won't deliver to my location but pops up in delivery for my current area.

name: jose esquivel
text: Awesome pizza. Love the crust. Just a tad pricey but well worth it. I have not had any issues with the pizzas from there unlike Little Ceasars. As I write this review I actually feel like ordering a pizza now. So for great pizza, order from Hungry Howie's.

name: Peter B
text: Delicious food, lunch specials, good salads for a healthy option. They have subs, wings, stuffed cheese bread, and rolls in addition to pizza. Various flavored crusts are a plus. I went during the week around 2 p.m. and it was a bit of a wait, so recommend to order ahead.

name: Alk paz
text: I've never had a problem with any pizza place in Laredo. Taste is subjective. I've been coming to HH for a little over 10yrs. They have a drive-thru pickup now which is much safer than having to "go inside", especially in these days. Thank you HH for still making one heck of a pizza, and actually having that drive-thru window! :D

name: Norma Valdez
text: they need to fix the way they speak. VERY RUDE and I was just asking for my money back because they did my order incorrectly and they charged me more than the real price for the pizzas and they handed me my money in a really rude way. HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE

name: Mario Martinez
text: First time there; their pizza didn't taste right.

name: Pearl Nation
text: For being our first time eating this pizza it was sooo good I would recommend this pizza place to any one.

name: Luis Orozco
text: Clean, polite, no wait, pizza was GREAT AND THE WINGS!!!! OH MY GOD THOSE WINGS!!!! next time I want pizza I ain’t going to dominos, Pizza Hut, little Caesar’s, ci ci’s, papa johns or pizza patron I’m going to hungry howies! My wife, kids and I LOVED IT! I highly recommend this place.

name: Jorge Vela
text: For a long time I wanted to try out this place but never got the chance! However, the wait was more than worth it. Howie's Pizza was incredible and was one of the more delicious pizzas I have ever eaten and certainly one of the beat local …More

name: AJ Development
text: Great pizza and convenient location. I recommend the cinnamon bread sticks.

name: Albert Mccoy
text: Pizza at this spot - delicious. I love this place. The place has an awesome atmosphere.

name: Zach Sepesi
text:
I like their pizza at any time, really I do. But the pizza just isn't the stone oven, over the top ingredients that I know and love.
But again, I take out pizza from here frequently and never had a bad experience.

name: Kenny Reid
text: Fantastic!! Great fresh salad, sub was outstanding.  Friendly staff. Bar none the best pizza around.

name: Alexis Pina
text: Great pizza, loved the original large pepperoni not too greasy not dry everything tasted very good. They should make a bigger place to dine in for there is only two tables. The prices are very good aswell. Satisfied costumer will come again for sure.

name: Ed Devally
text: I must say I was impressed with this amazing pizza. Staff so friendly and the place is always clean. I recommend it highly.

name: Robert Pritchard
text: I ordered a large pizza and 16 wings with sauce on the side because some family members dont like buffalo sauce.....when I got home we found sauce already poured on the wings. A little disappointed😯

name: Orlando Espinoza
text: Great food!  Great prices!

name: Tyler Brooks
text: If I could give a zero star I would. I asked if they delivered to a local trucking company. Was told yes and processed my order. Received a call back with a gentlemen asking where the location was and said they didnt recognize the street …More

name: Hans Nunemaker
text: Best fastfood pizza in town.

name: Gabriela Alvarez
text: Super delicious 😋

name: Norma Valdez
text: Like the thin and crispy pizza they sell, good stuff!!!

name: Joe Leal
text: Nice place, reasonable, centrally located , good menu, delivers

name: Carlos G
text: Great service and place. Pizza is not that great. Hungry Howie's need to work on perfecting their dough.

name: carlos de leon
text: Love the pizza and the quick service. The great employees and the professional attitude they present.

name: Javier Solis Jr
text: Great pizza at excellent prices!

name: jake spruiell
text: Very good pizza; just wish their prices were more competitive.

name: Ana Placencia
text: Very good pizza very good service

name: goose003
text: Pizza is always good and the crust always get eaten as well. The crust is that good as well.

name: Gladys Gonzalez
text: Best pizza in town. Excellent customer service. Very fast.

name: Joaquin Moreno
text: Great staff with great food you can't beat it

name: Adolfo Gonzalez
text: Good hamburgers served here excellent restaurant.

name: Mariano Moreno
text: Worst place ever they mest up my order and got told that they can do nothing about it and would have to pay to change it

name: Aaron Pena
text: So my mom visited this location today. My mom speaks very little English so she was speaking in Spanish. This idiot young man working there didn't understand my mom so he tells her "what the F###, do you speak english". Instead of calling for the manger or someone to translate. very poor manners. very disappointing!!!!!!!!
